svg.desc: Picture Cube Activity Print, Cutout, Fold, and Glue your picture cube. A fun activity for kids. Edit SVG source code to insert your own square pictures, SVG or bitmap. Written by Jay Nick Handcoding SVG since 2001 Author of eBook, Learn SVG Interactively, published by Catto Creations, LLC http://www.jaynick.com Download a Picture Cubes of the Animals from the Chinese Calendar free from Catto Creations, LLC http://www.cattocreations.com/FreeStuff.html Catto Creations mission is Family, Literacy, and Enrichment Visit http://www.cattocreations.com for award winning children's eBooks Free ePub3 eBooks at http://www.cattocreations.com/ePub3.html

cc:Work.dc:title: Picture Cube Activity 2
cc:Work.dc:description: Print, Cutout, Fold, & Glue your picture cube. Edit SVG source code to insert your own square pictures, SVG or bitmap. A fun activity for kids.
